DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : - To determine mass balance recovery ( expired air , urine faeces ) route rate elimination 14C-Debio 1450 . - To determine metabolic profile 14C-Debio 1450 whole blood , plasma , urine faeces . - To determine pharmacokinetics total radioactivity Debio 1450 ( prodrug ) Debio 1452 ( active moiety ) plasma urine .
DOC.brief_title: Mass Balance Recovery Metabolic Profile 14C Debio 1450 Following Single Oral Intravenous Doses Healthy Male Subjects
